name: and/oauth
description:
Support for authenticating users (without dependency from any framework) using both OAuth1 and OAuth2 methods. Also provide service, which allow to get user data by only one method call. 
Supports: Amazon, Bitbucket, Bitly, Box, Buffer, Dailymotion, Dropbox, Etsy, Facebook, Fitbit, Flickr, Foursquare, Github, Google, Harvest, Instagram, Jawbone, Linkedin, Mailchimp, Microsoft, Paypal, Pocket, Reddit, Runkeeper, Scoopit, Soundcloud, Spotify, Tumblr, Twitter, Ustream, Vkontakte, Yahoo services out of box.

suggest.symfony/http-foundation: Allows using the Symfony Session storage backend.
suggest.predis/predis: Allows using the Redis storage backend.
suggest.ext-openssl: Allows for usage of secure connections with the stream-based HTTP client.
